name: Adventure Sword
desc: Your courage is added to this weapon's strength.

name: Almanac
desc:
When you depart, gain +2 insanity.
You cannot gain disorders.

name: Arc Bow
desc: Cumbersome: Spend c as an additional cost of activating this weapon.

affinity_bonus.desc: Range +2

name: Bandages
desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Remove up to 2 bleeding tokens from yourself or an adjacent survivor.

name: Beacon Shield
desc:
Add 2 to all hit locations.
Block 2: Spend a to ignore 2 hits the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

name: Beast Knuckle
desc: When you wound with this weapon, monster gains -1 toughness until end of the attack.

name: Bird Bread
desc: a Consume: Once per showdown, add 1 to all hit locations. Gain priority target token. Roll 1d10. On a 1, reduce your survival to 0.

name: Blood Paint
desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Activate weapon gear to the left and right of this card. These are two separate attacks. Cannot be used with two-handed weapons.

name: Blood Sheath
desc: When Rainbow Katana is left of Blood Sheath, it loses Frail and gains Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt).

affinity_bonus.desc: When you are picked as a target, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster must pick a new target, if possible.
Unshakeable: When you draw a Trap, roll 1d10. On a 6+, discard the Trap and reshuffle the deck.

name: Bone Axe
desc: Savage: Once per attack, if you critically wound, cause 1 additional wound. This effect does not apply to impervious hit locations.

name: Bone Blade
desc:
Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks.
Archive this card at the end of the attack.

name: Bone Club
desc: Cumbersome: Spend c as an additional cost to activate this weapon. Ignore Cumbersome if this weapon is activated indirectly (Pounce, Charge, etc.).

name: Bone Dagger
desc:
On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival.
Perfect Hit: An attack roll result of a lantern 10.

name: Bone Darts
desc: Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive this card at the end of the attack.

name: Bone Earrings
desc: At the start of the showdown, gain +2 speed and +2 strength tokens if insane and all gear in your gear grid has the bone keyword.

name: Bone Pickaxe
desc: After Hunt phase setup, place the Mineral Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Bone Sickle
desc: After Hunt phase setup, place the Herb Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Boss Mehndi
desc: Boss is brave. While adjacent to you, insane survivors gain +1 speed.

name: Brain Mint
desc: a Consume: Remove all your tokens and stand up. You may use this while knocked down. Use once per showdown.

name: Bug Trap
desc: At the start of the showdown, roll 1d10. On a 3+, add a Bug Patch terrain card to the showdown board.

name: Butcher Cleaver
desc:
Sentient: Must be insane to activate.
Irreplaceable: When you die, archive this card.

name: Cat Eye Circlet
desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Reveal the next 3 monster hit locations and put them back in any order.

affinity_bonus.desc: On a perfect hit, gain +1 strength token. When knocked down, remove all your +1 strength tokens.

name: Cat Gut Bow
desc: Aim: When you attack, before rolling to hit, you may reduce the speed of this weapon by 1 to gain +2 accuracy for that attack.

name: Claw Head Arrow
desc:
Slow, Ammo-Bow: You must have a bow in your gear grid to activate this.
If you hit, monster gains -1 evasion token. Use once per showdown.

name: Cloth
desc: The Cloth protects your waist. Gain 1 armor point at the waist hit location.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains Devastating 1: Whenever you wound, inflict 1 additional wound.

name: Crest Crown
desc: a: If insane, reshuffle hit location deck.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you depart, gain +1 insanity and +1 survival for every <font class="kdm_font_2 affinity_blue_text">h</font> you have.

name: Death Mask
desc: If you have no affinities, gain +4 luck and suffer -4 to all severe injury rolls.

name: Dragon Slayer
desc: Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Dried Acanthus
desc: When you depart, gain +2 survival. When you suffer a severe injury, ignore it and archive this card instead.

name: Elder Earrings
desc: At the start of the showdown, gain +2 survival. +1 Hunt XP after a showdown.

name: Feather Mantle
desc: When you suffer knockback, you may ignore collision with other survivors and reduce movement by up to 3 spaces.

affinity_bonus.desc: Reduce any suffered brain damage by 1 to a minimum of 1.

name: Fecal Salve
desc:
When you depart, gain +1 survival
a: You are not a threat until you attack. If you have the priority target token, remove it.

name: Final Lantern
desc: On Arrival, all survivors gain the Horripilation survivor status card. (See the Watcher's AI Deck.) When not insane, flip this card.

affinity_bonus.desc: As long as you have 5+ survival, gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength.

name: First Aid Kit
desc:
On Arrival, all survivors gain +3 survival.
a: Remove 1 bleeding or negative attribute token from yourself or an adjacent survivor.

name: Forsaker Mask
desc:
During the Aftermath, you run off into the darkness never to be seen again.
During the Settlement Phase, you may archive this item to build the Mask Maker location.

name: Founding Stone
desc:
Spend a to sling the stone from anywhere on the board! Archive this card for 1 automatic hit that inflicts a critical wound.
Archive: Return this card to the game box.

name: Frenzy Drink
desc: a Consume: Suffer Frenzy brain trauma. Can be used once per showdown.

affinity_bonus.desc: Undeathable: If you would die, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you inexplicably survive.

name: Hollow Sword
desc: On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll.

name: Hollowpoint Arrow
desc: On a hit, monster gains -1 movement token. Use once per showdown.

name: Hours Ring
desc: Do not gain any tokens for any reason. Do not gain Hunt XP or weapon proficiency. Retired wearers can depart.

affinity_bonus.desc: On a Perfect hit, discard 1 mood in play.

name: King Spear
desc: Reach 2: May attack from 2 spaces away.

name: Lance of Longinus
desc: Each showdown, the first time you wound, the monster gains a -1 toughness token.

name: Lantern Armor Set
desc:
You feel invincible. On Arrival, gain survival up to the survival limit.
The extra weight is leverage. All clubs in your gear grid gain Sharp.

name: Lantern Cuirass
desc: -2 movement.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you depart, add 3 to all hit locations with metal armor.

desc:
Add 2 to all hit locations.

desc: On Arrival, if possible, add an Acanthus Plant terrain card to the showdown. When you activate terrain, you may add +2 to your roll result.

desc: Slam: Spend c to full move forward in a straight line. If you move 4+ spaces and stop adjacent to a monster, it suffers knockback 1 and -1 toughness until the end of the round.
